snippet.title: Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny Remaster Developer Diary - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
Capcom swung by this year's Future Games Show Spring Showcase with a developer diary for the upcoming Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny remaster. The diary focused on the game's new difficulty setting, "Hell" mode. It's coming to PC, PlayStation, Xbox and Nintendo Switch on May 23, 2025.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #onimusha2

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
